subject: Golf
Fishing, Sport
British Open (Golf)
Sharks
lead_paragraph: Spieth, who is competing in the John Deere Classic as he prepares for the British Open, the third leg in his bid for a calendar Grand Slam, found a use for his tenacity on a fishing excursion.
snippet: Spieth, who is competing in the John Deere Classic as he prepares for the British Open, the third leg in his bid for a calendar Grand Slam, found a use for his tenacity on a fishing excursion.
